civilopediaText.text: If you are reading this and are using the Civ V Brave New World mod, you activated your modsin the wrong order!
Make sure you activated More Wonders BEFORE Civ V Brave New World, otherwise you may find weird errors.
If you are not currently using Civ V Brave New World, you can ignore this. This resource will not impact your game.
